item.title: Help with shops
item.dc:creator: @intPkx intPkx
item.description:
@intPkx wrote:

You need to make sure you have this.

if (WanneShop > 0) { if (GoodDistance(skillX, skillY, absX, absY, 1) == true) { openUpShop(WanneShop); WanneShop = 0; } }

Read full topic
